abstract.para: Storage pools are locations (like directories or partitions) where VM images are stored.

step.para: Navigate to Virtual machines and click the Storage pools link.
In the Create storage pool page, enter the following details:

listitem.para: Select the Connection as either System or User session.
Select the storage pool type from the drop-down list.
Select the host path from the drop-down list.
To configure pool to start when host boots, select Start pool when host boots checkbox.

section.title: Managing a storage pool
section.para: To perform any administration task on an existing storage pool, perform the following steps:

step.para: Navigate to the Virtual machines page and select the Networks link.
Here you can perform the following actions with existing storage pools:

listitem.para: Click the Activate button next to the required storage pool.
Click Deactivate next to the storage pool name.
In the three-dot menu, select Delete.
